Successfully deleted the Yoga task from Asana.

2. ‚úì Clicked on "My tasks" in the navigation
3. ‚úì Scrolled down to locate the Yoga task in the "Recently assigned" section
4. ‚úì Clicked on the Yoga task to select it
5. ‚úì Opened the task Details pane
6. ‚úì Clicked on "More actions" button
7. ‚úì Selected "Delete task" from the menu
8. ‚úì Verified the task was deleted (confirmed by "Deleted" notification and "This task is deleted" message)
9. ‚úì Closed the task detail pane and confirmed the Yoga task is no longer visible in the task list
